sql: SELECT DISTINCT round(CURRENT_BALANCE,2) AS CURRENT_BALANCE FROM Customer.LOANS;
SELECT DISTINCT round(INTEREST_RATE,2) AS INTEREST_RATE FROM Customer.LOANS;
SELECT DISTINCT round(OPENING_BALANCE,2) AS OPENING_BALANCE FROM Customer.LOANS;
SELECT DISTINCT strftime('%Y', LOAN_OPEN_DATE) AS LOAN_OPENING_YEAR FROM Customer.LOANS;
SELECT (strftime('%Y', 'now') - strftime('%Y', LOAN_OPEN_DATE)) - (strftime('%m-%d', 'now') < strftime('%m-%d', LOAN_OPEN_DATE)) AS LOAN_AGE FROM Customer.LOANS;
